text: Iwo amene adasiyidwa m’mbuyo adasangalala chifukwa cha kukhala kwawo pambuyo pa Mtumwi wa Mulungu, iwo amadana ndi kukamenya nkhondo ndi chuma chawo ndiponsoiwoeniyokhazikitsaulamulirowa Mulungundipo iwo adati, “Musapite ku nkhondo chifukwa kuli kutentha kwambiri.” Nena, “Moto wa ku Gahena ndi wotentha kwambiri,” iwo akadangozindikira
